data.title: Nepal Currency Guide: Nepalese Rupee to INR Rate in India
data.meta_description: Currency of Nepal: Nepal currency name is Nepalese Rupee. Get info on Nepalese Rupee to INR rate in India. Use our converter to convert Nepal Currency in INR.
data.text:
Fill in the email Address that you used to register or book with SOTC.

The official currency in Nepal is the Nepalese Rupee. If you are on a Nepal holiday, you can carry Indian Rupees in the denomination of Rs 100 and can get the same exchanged at the airport through an authorised agency. Nepalese Rupee comes in the denomination of 20, 25, 50, 100, 500 and 1000 rupee notes and 1, 2, 5 and 10 coins.

Before you get your currency exchanged, it is always best to check the exchange rate. Indian Rupee has a fixed exchange rate, so it is best to get the same confirmed.

Indian Rupee Facts

Overview Indian Rupee Currency Name Indian Rupee Short Name INR Symbols ₹ Unit 1/100, CENT Frequently Used Currency (Denomination) ₹10, ₹20, ₹50, ₹100, ₹200, ₹500, ₹2,000

If you plan to use the ATMs, it is necessary to check if the same will accept your credit or debit card for withdrawal. You can use your cards in the major town or cities. However, you will need to pay by cash at smaller shops and locations.

For more information on your Nepal tour package, call SOTC today.
